thread.title: Spotted: Hema Malini and other Bollywood celebs
thread.title_full: Spotted: Hema Malini and other Bollywood celebs - Entertainment

author: Special featues
title: Spotted: Hema Malini and other Bollywood celebs
text:
Hema Malini celebrated her 67th birthday with the media on October 16 by cutting a cake. The veteran actress, who became a grandmother recently, continues to live up to the tag, ‘dreamgirl’.
Artsy bug 

Juhi Chawla admires the display at a photo exhibition. Sonakshi Sinha’s mom, Poonam was also spotted here. Pic/Datta Kumbhar
Fashion diaries


Neha Dhupia attended London Fashion Week in a sexy blue saree.
In support 

(L-R) Deepak Singh, Kranti Prakash Jha, Imtiaz Ali, Neetu Chandra, Nitin Chandra, Pankaj Jha and Aarti Puri 
Neetu Chandra’s second production received support from director Imtiaz Ali. Once Upon A Time In Bihar is based on true incidents that unfolded in Buxar, Bihar.
In style 

Dorris and Bharat Godambe 
Bharat and Dorris Godambe hosted a fashion show and convocation ceremony in Mumbai.

Aneel Muraka
